programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: You Said I Wasn't The Father
programme.desc: Alvin began to get very distant from his family, so Andrea began a relationship with Chris, a man she met on a chat line. Then, Brittany and Tony have an infant daughter together, but since getting Brittany pregnant he has abandoned his family.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Korey is positive that his girlfriend Dominique is cheating on him and is also worried that she might be a prostitute. She says that his suspicions have caused him to become abusive. Then, Gregory thinks that his girlfriend Robin isn’t faithful!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Tonya is here to stop her 14-year-old daughter Talia from ruining her life before she’s an adult. She doesn’t approve of her boyfriend Jerry who needs to get out of her daughter’s life because he’s responsible for everything that’s wrong with her.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Erica kicked her boyfriend Martez out of their house and out of her life. But she’s willing to give him a second chance if he proves that he didn’t molest her 4 year old son! Then, Christy’s ex Stephen refuses to admit that he fathered her son!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Dustin wants a baby with his wife Tessa, but he thinks she is taking birth control because she's been cheating. Then, Anthony says that he's been physically abusive to his fiancee Marie, because he believes that she's been cheating on him.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: A Father's Fight for His Daughter
programme.desc: Robert believes his daughter is being abused and molested by her stepfather, John, but John and Tiffany denies any abuse. Is Tiffany covering for John’s abuse? See the shocking lie detector test today!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: I Want Justice for My Daughter
programme.desc: Cassey believes she recently uncovered her ex-husband Calvin’s evil deeds, which he was trying to cover up with gifts for his daughter, but did he actually molest her daughter? Or has she had it all wrong?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: You Wrote Dirty Letters to Her Mom?
programme.desc: Katie says her boyfriend, Brandon, is addicted to porn and has caught him sending dirty letters to other women including her mother! Then, 6 months into dating Crosby, Dayana cheated on him and now, he wants to know if their child is his!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Secrets revealed ... Since the start of their relationship, Nareda has slowly been discovering more and more of Kenny's secrets. On their wedding day, she first learned that he had lied about his age and was only 18 years old, much younger than she. She also came to learn he was verbally and physically abusive. Now that she suspects he's been cheating, she wants the truth, and she's making a final decision on her misleading relationship.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: My Kids Watch Him Hit Me
programme.desc: Jared says that he is positive that his wife Sarah is cheating on him and he admits to physically abusing Sarah because he says he hates being lied to. Sarah, who is pregnant, says that she's desperate to stop Jared's abusing ways.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Does My Husband Have a Creepy Addiction?
programme.desc: Jennifer fears that her husband Tim is addicted to teenage porn and has heard rumors of him sneaking underage girls into their house. Is Amanda’s man a child molester and peeping Tom? How will these wives react to the lie detector test results?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: I Saw You Through The Window
programme.desc: Laharla caught her mother's boyfriend Victor cheating when she saw him through their window. Then, Aaron claims that a woman named Olivia will not leave him alone after they met in person.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Did Marcus’s ex’s boyfriend Charles molest their son? Ex Jamaica is torn between kicking out Charles for the meanwhile and wondering if Marcus’s girlfriend Tonya is lying to gain custody of the boy. What will Charles’s lie detector test say?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Do Not Touch Her on My Stage
programme.desc: Scott and Dawn want their sister Betty to leave her abusive boyfriend Michael of 11 months. Michael says Betty abuses him, too, but Scott and Dawn don’t believe him. The drama will explode when Scott confronts Michael on our stage today!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Steve's looking back on some of the funniest moments from his show. You'll definitely laugh out loud at these unforgettable guests. Don't miss one second of the fun on today's Steve Wilkos Show.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Stephanie’s drug addiction led her to severely neglect and abuse their children. As Scott’s fiancée Amy has stepped in as a mother and Stephanie fails multiple drug tests, he doesn’t want her near the children, but wants her to atone for her wrongs!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Kaliegh is 23 and is a heroin addict. Her mother, best friend and ex-boyfriend who got her hooked on heroin in the first place, are here to beg her to go to rehab. Follow her as she travels to the rehab clinic and tries to get clean!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: You're Certain He's The Father?/Why Didn't You Tell Me?
programme.desc: Grace wants to expose ex-boyfriend Kenny for destroying her teen years and denying their child. Then, Kendra suspects boyfriend Brandon is cheating on her with his ex Monique, and she thinks he has the STD to prove it!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Three years ago, Manny was accused of sexually molesting Elizabeth’s daughter. While he declares his innocence, Elizabeth has strong doubts and her husband Rodney is caught in the middle. Is he innocent?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: When this young man says that he'd kill his own mother if the gang asked him to, Steve decides to hold an intervention. With the help of an ex-gang member, they try to speak some truth into this gangster from suburbia.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Elaina and her husband Lennard claim their daughter was raped by her brother-in-law Lenel. Lenel’s fiancée and Elaina’s sister, Elissa, believes they’re making up this entire story. Don’t miss the shocking results today!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Keith has been accused of touching his 3-year-old son inappropriately by Crystal, the mother of his children, which he strongly denies. He says this is the result of her anger over an affair he had. But will the lie detector test prove him right?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Jessica can't make sense of her on again off again relationship with Wade and it's starting to drive her crazy. Wade however claims he's had nothing to do with Jessica and she's been spreading lies and stalking him for years.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Jeremy hasn't seen his child in four years, but after coming clean, he wants to right the wrongs that he's done. Julie, his ex and mother of their child, doesn't buy it, claiming that he spends more time with his new girlfriends child than his own.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Wait! Don’t Read the Results Yet Steve…
programme.desc: Sharina thinks that Clarence is cheating on her because he’s always staying out late. Plus, Chrystal doesn’t want Earnie’s ex Tenyia to stay with them just because she’s the mother of his child. Is he also cheating on her?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Eric and Lisa are divorced and Eric is now dating Keri. Both Eric and Keri feel like Lisa is stalking them by sending him text messages and naked pictures. Then, Christopher has been unable to trust Olivia and thinks she may be cheating again.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Brandie is a 16 year old sex addict who claims to have slept with over 200 men. Steve enlists the help of Marvelyn, a woman who contracted HIV at the age of 19. Then, Shantaysia is 19 years old and works as a prostitute.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Brandi and Marty have been together 5 years. Brandi's brother and her mother claim that Marty is being physically abusive and has been cheating. Plus, Jessica worries that Derwin is now cheating on her and claims that he's been abusive towards her.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: How Could You Cover for Him?
programme.desc: Gina believes her grandson is being abused by her daughter's boyfriend Efrain. Her daughter wants to prove that he's innocent and is furious at her mom for accusing him. Was Gina right or is Efrain really innocent?

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: A woman discovers her man has been cheating with various women; a woman suspects her husband is cheating with their roommate.
